Kolmogorov-Arnold Network for
Atherosclerotic Cardiovascular Disease Prediction

Sang-Kyun Ko1, Sun-Wha Kim1, Whi Kwon1, Si-Hyuck Kang1,2,*, Chang-Hwan Yoon1,2, Tae-Jin Youn1,2, In-Ho Chae1,2

About ü´Ä

  • Estimating the 10-year risk of atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease (ASCVD) is a clinically important task in cardiology.
  • This page estimates your 10-year ASCVD risk using a Kolmogorov‚ÄìArnold Network trained on health screening data from about 2 million Korean adults.
  • Enter your health screening information below to receive your personalized risk prediction.
Providing information on the following 14 variables can improve the accuracy of your risk prediction. Please enter the values below if available. (To be updated)

Who Should Use This Calculator

This calculator is designed for adults aged 30‚Äì79 years who do not have a history of cardiovascular disease, such as coronary artery disease, stroke, or heart failure. It aims to assist both clinicians and individuals in evaluating preventive strategies, including lifestyle modifications and the consideration of medical therapies.
